name: France France Revolution: Vive La Dance!
name_original: France France Revolution: Vive La Dance!
description:
As painted (literally) nobles, competitively dance your way out of execution in revolutionary France! Each button controls a limb.

Created for Southampton Game Jam 2017.

Team

Kev Adsett - Production & Code
Gavin Jones - Design, Music & Code
Samad Iqbal - Art & Driving
Alex Gulliver - Code
